wybug_title: 猿题库git服务使用不当导致源代码泄露
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-01-22：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 源代码泄露 详细说明：  找到http://www.yuantiku.com/campus/.git/config然后使用工具rip-git.pl脱下源码   漏洞证明：  config[core]	repositoryformatversion = 0	filemode = true	bare = false	logallrefupdates = true[remote "origin"]	fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*	url = ssh://fenbi@gerrit.zhenguanyu.com:29418/recurit[branch "master"]	remote = origin	merge = refs/heads/masterHEAD0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 2039b0f3750643df922642076b53ce7abc6b3757 fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1409932770 +0800	clone: from ssh://fenbi@gerrit.zhenguanyu.com:29418/recurit2039b0f3750643df922642076b53ce7abc6b3757 da8486c9773e550cc13bef84700c706e257d2ea5 fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1409932971 +0800	pull : Fast-forwardda8486c9773e550cc13bef84700c706e257d2ea5 27d57234be9b6a8ad8282fabafa6ead5f7f7079e fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1411972721 +0800	pull : Fast-forward27d57234be9b6a8ad8282fabafa6ead5f7f7079e 67374c8fc9644da9153d2fe740dc47dc25e87bc8 fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1411972825 +0800	pull : Fast-forward67374c8fc9644da9153d2fe740dc47dc25e87bc8 5feb9612a8e483426c0e1d0e9da77d0a90bd929a fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1411982735 +0800	pull : Fast-forward5feb9612a8e483426c0e1d0e9da77d0a90bd929a a8268d5e8622b449288dc52f6626ae66c33a1e98 fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1413193459 +0800	pull : Fast-forwarda8268d5e8622b449288dc52f6626ae66c33a1e98 b5ed7f35c608aee7c9952becfc87ec3d10b1c0d9 fenbi <fenbi@fenbi.com> 1413193626 +0800	pull : Fast-forward   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 cinba@乌云
